casebody.data:
Hill, Appellee, v. The State of Ohio, Appellant.

[Cite as Hill v. State, 139 Ohio St.3d 451, 2014-Ohio-2365.]

(No. 2013-1043 Submitted May 28, 2013 Decided June 12, 2014.) The Owen Firm, L.L.C., and Todd A. Long, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of Mansaray v. State, 138 Ohio St.3d 277, 2014-Ohio-750, 6 N.E.3d 35.

Judgment reversed.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Kennedy, French, and O’Neill, JJ., concur. *452Michael DeWine, Attorney General, Alexandra T. Schimmer, Solicitor General, and Samuel C. Peterson, Deputy Solicitor, for appellant.
